stories.text: I talk to some people in classes and we're pleasant to each other but haven't gotten beyond acquaintance with any of them. I know some people from a club I'm in but don't see them outside of that. It doesn't help that I'm a computer science major and I don't have a lot of interests that CS majors have (anime, video games, social media, etc.) Advice on how to connect better with people?
stories.title: Ask HN: I'm making like 0 friends at college, how to fix it?
Clean Air for a Sustainable World
If 8 Popular Websites Existed in the ‘90s
Wireless, Off-Grid, No-License Communication for $27.99 (Lora Meshtastic)

stories.text: So is it better a device - whos security is invalidated shuts down completely or should it continue to provide the service it was designated for?
stories.title: Whats more valuable – a unsecured functional or a secured dysfunctional device?

stories.text:
Hi HN. My wife's Instagram account has been deactivated and blocked because we moved and don't have the phone number associated with the account anymore. It's asking for the SMS verification code. All attempts to get help have failed, and many require being logged in. There seems no way to contact a human.

We're working with a friend back where we came from, trying to get the number back. It may not be possible.

Is her account of ten years just gone? She was slowly building up her audience hoping to be an "influencer" one day. The thought of starting over from zero is heart breaking for her.

Is there anything we can try?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to Reach a Human at Instagram
